attributes.additional_details:
Reciprocal migration and free trade would promote economic growth, prosperity and opportunity amongst the four nations. 
Foreign policy cooperation would increase military and defence collaboration.

The alliance between these four likeminded, sovereign nations would create a tremendous presence on the international stage. 

The earlier CANZUK is formed, the better, especially as we recover from the Covid-19 Pandemic.
attributes.background: CANZUK is a diplomatic alliance between Canada, Australia, New Zealand and the United Kingdom, promoting reciprocal migration, free trade and foreign policy.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

CANZUK: Seek free movement and free trade with Canada, Australia & New Zealand
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584175
